summary: This bill, the Securing Continued Healthcare for Our Operations and Logistics Professionals Act of 2025, aims to clarify the rules regarding employer responsibility to provide health coverage for contractors working for educational organizations. It amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that contractors providing services to educational organizations are subject to similar rules as the organizations' employees when determining full-time employee status for health coverage purposes. The bill's effective date is the month after the date of enactment.
